Japanese: これを見ろ

Japanese: ……おっと、その前に⏎たたかい方を教えよう⏸剣は持っているか?⏸そう、そのタッチペンが剣だ。⏎だいじな剣だから なくすんじゃないぞ⏸はじき出すように タッチペンをすばやく⏎『スライド』してはなすとダッシュこうげき⏸ダッシュこうげきはダメージは小さいが⏎てきを大きくはじきとばせる⏸それからもう1つ⏸同じばしょで ずっとタッチしていると⏎力をタメることができる⏸タメている時にダッシュこうげきをすると⏎あたえるダメージが大きくなるぞ⏸さいごに たたかいのきほんを教える⏸てきに近づいて『タッチ』すれば⏎剣でこうげきをおこなう⏸それから、てきにあたえるダメージには⏎バラつきがある⏸それは、オレたちのバイオリズムに⏎ふかく かんけいしているからだ
Google Translate: ...Oh, before that, ⏎Let me teach you how to fight. ⏸ Do you have a sword? ⏸ Yes, that touch pen is a sword. ⏎It's an important sword, so don't lose it. ⏸ Move the stylus quickly as if you were flicking it out. ⏎ Slide it and release it to perform a dash attack. ⏸ The dash attack does less damage, but ⏎ It can flick away a large amount of damage. And then there's one more thing. ⏸ Same. If you touch it for a long time, you can charge it with power.If you do a dash attack while charging, the damage you deal will increase.Finally, you will be taught the basics of fighting. If you touch it, it will attack you with your sword.Then, there will be variations in the damage it inflicts.This is because it is in full harmony with our biorhythms.
Translated:
Oh、but first!⏸
Let me teach you how⏎
to fight!⏸
Do you have a sword?⏸
Yes、the stylus will⏎
do - don’t lose it!⏸
Flick the stylus to⏎
do a dash attack⏸
It does less damage⏎
than normal、but can⏸
knock the enemy back⏸
If you hold the⏎
stylus in one place⏸
for a bit、you can⏎
charge up power⏸
Charge up then dash⏎
to do more damage⏸
And of course、you⏎
can do basic attacks⏸
by simply tapping on⏎
your target⏸
The damage from each⏎
hit varies over time⏸
This is due to your⏎
biorhythms!
Notes: Good lord, that’s a lot of text

Japanese: 上画面になにか出てきただろう。⏎今でているのはバイオリズムだ⏸フィリがちょうど てっぺんにきた時に⏎こうげきすると、ひっさつ技が出るぞ⏸ひっさつ技はタイミングがむずかしい。⏎かけ声を聞いてタイミングをおぼえるといい⏸「ふんっ!」とふんばる声をきいたらすぐ⏎てきに近づいて『タッチ』だ!⏸『タッチ』いがいに⏎マイクに向かってさけんでも⏸ひっさつ技が出るというウワサだ……

Timing is difficult for the hit move. ⏎It's a good idea to memorize the timing by listening to the shout ⏸ As soon as you hear the ``Hun!'' sound ⏎ Approach the person and say ``touch''! ⏸ Try to ``touch'' ⏎ Even if you shout into the microphone ⏸ Hissa There is a rumor that there will be a new technique...
